text: Hubert Perring (born 19 January 1957) is a French equestrian. He competed in two events at the 2008 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:French male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of France Category:Equestrians at the 2008 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Auxerre
title: Hubert Perring
